name: Bun Shami Kebab
description: A savory shami kebab patty made from minced meat and lentils, seasoned with aromatic spices, tucked inside a soft bun. A perfect quick bite.

name: Chicken Bread
description: Soft, savory bread generously filled with seasoned, tender chicken pieces. A satisfying snack or light meal on the go.

name: Chicken Cheese and Onion Roll
description: A delectable roll packed with flavorful chicken, melted cheese, and savory onions, all wrapped in a soft, golden pastry. Warm and satisfying.

name: Chicken Cheese Burger
description: A classic chicken cheese burger featuring a juicy chicken patty, melted cheese, fresh lettuce, and creamy sauce in a soft bun.

name: Chicken Cheese Samosa
description: Crispy golden pastry filled with a mouth-watering mixture of seasoned chicken and gooey melted cheese. An irresistible savory snack.

name: Chicken Chinese Pastry
description: A savory pastry with an Asian-inspired twist, filled with tender chicken and vegetables in a flavorful Chinese-style sauce, encased in flaky pastry.

name: Chicken Crust Roll
description: Tender, seasoned chicken encased in a uniquely crispy and flaky crust. A delightful texture and taste experience.

name: Chicken Drumstick
description: A succulent and flavorful fried or baked chicken drumstick, seasoned to perfection. A classic savory treat.

name: Chicken Grill Burger
description: A healthy and delicious grilled chicken burger featuring a perfectly grilled chicken breast, fresh veggies, and a light sauce in a toasted bun.

name: Chicken Kebab Stick
description: Tender, marinated pieces of chicken grilled on a skewer, bursting with aromatic spices. Perfect as an appetizer or a light snack.

name: Chicken Mushroom Roll
description: A savory roll filled with a creamy mixture of diced chicken and sautéed mushrooms, wrapped in a soft, golden pastry.

name: Chicken Pie
description: A comforting individual chicken pie with a flaky pastry crust and a rich, creamy filling of tender chicken and vegetables.

name: Chicken Pizza Garlic
description: A personal-sized snack pizza topped with succulent chicken pieces, a generous spread of aromatic garlic sauce, and melted cheese.

name: Chicken Pizza Snack
description: A bite-sized, delicious chicken pizza, perfect for a quick savory snack. Topped with chicken, tomato sauce, and cheese.

name: Chicken Quiche Pie
description: A savory individual quiche featuring a creamy egg custard base, tender chicken pieces, and cheese baked in a buttery pastry crust.

name: Chicken Roll
description: A classic chicken roll with a flavorful seasoned chicken filling wrapped in a soft bread or pastry. Simple, yet satisfying.

name: Chicken Samosa
description: Crispy, golden-fried pastry filled with a savory and spiced minced chicken mixture. A popular and flavorful snack.

name: Chicken Sandwich 6 pieces
description: A delightful platter of six mini chicken sandwich triangles, filled with creamy chicken salad or sliced chicken. Perfect for sharing or a light meal.

name: Chicken Shami Kebab
description: Soft, flavorful chicken shami kebabs made from minced chicken and lentils, infused with aromatic spices. Served per piece.

name: Chicken Spicy Burger
description: Turn up the heat with our spicy chicken burger! A crispy, spicy chicken fillet, fresh lettuce, and tangy sauce in a soft bun.

name: Chicken Spicy Pizza
description: A fiery snack pizza for spice lovers, topped with spicy chicken, jalapeños, chili flakes, and melted cheese on a crispy base.

name: Chicken Thai Stick
description: Skewered chicken pieces marinated in authentic Thai spices (lemongrass, chili, coconut milk) and grilled to perfection. Sweet, savory, and slightly spicy.

name: Club Sandwich 2 pieces
description: A classic triple-decker club sandwich with layers of chicken, bacon (or alternative), lettuce, tomato, and mayonnaise. Served as two hearty pieces.

name: Egg and Cheese Sandwich
description: A simple yet satisfying sandwich with fluffy scrambled or fried egg and melted cheese, nestled between slices of soft bread.

name: Grill Chicken Roast
description: A whole or half tender and juicy grilled roast chicken, marinated in herbs and spices for a rich, savory flavor. Perfect for a meal.

name: Grilled Panini Sandwich 2 pieces
description: Warm, pressed panini sandwich filled with delicious ingredients like grilled chicken, cheese, and vegetables. Served as two grilled halves.

name: Jalapeno Burger
description: A fiery burger for those who love a kick! Juicy patty topped with spicy jalapeños, melted cheese, and zesty sauce.

name: Mix Vegetable Roll
description: A healthy and flavorful roll packed with a medley of fresh, seasoned mixed vegetables, wrapped in a soft pastry or flatbread.

name: Mix Vegetable Samosa
description: Crispy pastry filled with a delicious and lightly spiced mixture of assorted vegetables like peas, carrots, and potatoes.

name: Plain Chicken Burger
description: A simple and satisfying chicken burger with a seasoned chicken patty in a soft bun. Perfect for customizing with your favorite toppings.

name: Sausage Burger
description: A unique twist on a burger, featuring a savory sausage patty, often with cheese and sauce, in a soft burger bun.

name: Shashlik Stick
description: Skewers of marinated meat (often chicken or beef) and colorful vegetables like bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes, grilled to perfection.

name: Stream Chicken Roast Piece
description: A single, tender piece of steam-roasted chicken, lightly seasoned and incredibly juicy. A healthy and flavorful snack or meal component.

name: Stream Chicken Roast
description: Healthy and tender steam-roasted chicken (whole or half), seasoned with herbs and spices for a delicate and juicy flavor. Ideal for a satisfying meal.

name: Vegetable Cream Cheese Sandwich
description: A refreshing sandwich filled with creamy cream cheese and a mix of crisp, fresh vegetables like cucumber, carrots, and bell peppers.
